profile:
Halton Pool Guys have been proudly servicing our customers designing, building and renovating in ground fiberglass, vinyl and concrete swimming pools in the Halton Region since 1996. We are certified, licensed and insured.

With a combined expertise of over 30-years in the business we are pleased to service Acton, Georgetown, Halton Hills, Caledon West, Milton and North Mississauga.
services: In ground pool design and construction.  Pool renovations, equipment upgrades, vinyl liner and safety cover sales and installations and more.
memberships: Pool and Hot Tub Council of Canada, Landscape Ontario, Halton Hills Chamber of Commerce
